# Kenya Data Protection Act 2019

## Key Clauses
- **§25:** Lawful processing
- **§29:** Sensitive personal data
- **§42:** Cross-border transfers

## iLuminara Relevance
- Offline edge localization; consent in Swahili pipeline
- Amplifies GDPR in African contexts → Malabo Convention continental flows

## Amplification Synergy
- Amplifies: GDPR, Malabo Convention

## Data-Driven Law Proposal
- If >90% prevention efficacy, propose strengthening cross-border safeguards
